authToken.label: Auth Token
authToken.help: Bearer token for Valence server (or use ${VALENCE_AUTH_TOKEN})

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Inject relevant memories into context before agent runs

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Extract insights from conversations as memories

recallMaxResults.label: Recall Max Results
recallMaxResults.help: Maximum memories to inject on auto-recall (default: 5)

memoryMdSync.label: MEMORY.md Sync
memoryMdSync.help: Sync MEMORY.md from Valence knowledge as a disaster-recovery fallback

memoryMdPath.label: MEMORY.md Path
memoryMdPath.help: Relative path for the MEMORY.md DR file

sessionIngestion.label: Session Ingestion
sessionIngestion.help: Capture conversations as Valence sources for compilation into knowledge articles

staleSessionMinutes.label: Stale Session Threshold
staleSessionMinutes.help: Minutes of inactivity before a session is considered stale (default: 30)

autoCompileOnFlush.label: Auto-Compile on Flush
autoCompileOnFlush.help: Automatically trigger compilation when flushing sessions (default: true)

includeSystemMessages.label: Include System Messages
includeSystemMessages.help: Include system messages in session transcripts (default: true)

inferenceEnabled.label: Inference Proxy
inferenceEnabled.help: Let Valence use OpenClaw's models for knowledge compilation
